content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (4.5, -10.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore Pump at Position (4.5, -10.5)
- Boiler at Position (20.5, -4.0)
- Steam Engine at Position (22.5, -7.5)
- PipeGroup connecting the Offshore Pump, Boiler, and Steam Engine

### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of:
- Burner Mining Drill at Position (-11.0, 20.0) with a Wooden Chest at Position (-11.5, 18.5)
- Stone Furnace at Position (0.0, 0.0)
- Stone Furnace at Position (2.0, 0.0)

### Copper Ore Mining Facility
Consists of:
- Burner Mining Drill at Position (20.0, 20.0) with a Wooden Chest at Position (19.5, 18.5)

### Copper Cable Factory
Consists of:
- Assembling Machine at Position (10.5, 0.5)
- Inserter at Position (7.5, 5.5) and Wooden Chest at Position (8.5, 5.5)
- BeltGroup connecting the Assembling Machine and Inserter

### Water Supply System
Consists of:
- Offshore Pump at Position (19.5, -1.5)
- PipeGroup connecting the Offshore Pump to the Boiler

### Electricity Distribution Network
Consists of:
- ElectricityGroup with Small Electric Poles at various positions providing power to connected entities

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors When Inserting Items Without Inventory
- Ensure that the required items are available in your inventory before attempting to insert them into another entity.

### Errors When Using Inserters Without Source Items
- Ensure that the source items are available for the inserter to pick up before placing or activating the inserter.

### Errors When Assembling Without Required Ingredients
- Make sure that all required ingredients are available before starting an assembly process to avoid shortages and production halts.
